product_name: Vibram FiveFingers KMD Sport LS Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Vibram FiveFingers KMD Sport LS Shoes for men boast a quick-lace setup for a snug, comfortable fit while running or doing tough fitness training sessions. Individual toe slots enhance dexterity, control and stability to help deliver a natural motion. Stretchy uppers hug feet and offer quick-drying comfort; breathable stretch-mesh panels keep debris and grit out. Seamless 2mm polyurethane footbeds reduce friction underfoot for a stable, comfortable platform. 4mm Vibram outsoles are made of nonmarking Vibram TC1 rubber and feature traction pods that follow the contours of your feet and toes for enhanced traction. Antimicrobial sockliners help control odor development. The Vibram FiveFingers KMD Sport LS Shoes are machine washable in cold water; air dry only. Closeout.
short_description: The Vibram FiveFingers KMD Sport LS Shoes for men boast a quick-lace setup for a snug, comfortable fit while running or doing tough fitness training sessions.
